definitions.title: denom.
definitions.body: be-mantle (from BAram. [[כַּרְבְּלָא]] Da 3:21, if this = mantle, and not (Marti:Gl.) = Ass. karballatu, cap (but ‘ bKriegs [?]-Mantel, &rs Zehnpfund:BAS ii, 535)), or poss.

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[מְכֻרְבָּל בִּמְעִיל בּוּץ]] 1Ch 15:27 bemantled with a robe of byssus.
